about_the_game:
Support the game developer with the new DLC for Street Stallion: The Jaywalk Simulator - "Barista." Each purchase doesn't just get you a new, unique skin in-game, but also pays for my coffee, fueling those long nights of coding and enhancing your gameplay experience.

Step into the shoes of a street-smart barista, blending in with the morning rush, using your quick wit and agility to dodge busy commuters, all while maintaining the charm and finesse of your newly acquired persona.

  • Graphics: RTX 2070
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
